Lunarpine reverts to wolf mode and follows striker back to the Ark, 
he knew now more than ever he needed to learn the heirarchy of tha 
Maximal army if he was to fit in. he'd just joined them and already 
he'd questioned two orders. A true hunter needed to trust his 
instincts, a good soldier needed to trust his unit. He was the rookie 
here. He knew he'd fought before, now he needed to remember how.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Striker/Prowl::
> 
> Striker shakes his head, continuing to run, "They can handle 
themselves. 
> Right now we need to get moving from the Ark before the next 
attack."
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Prowl blinks as he hears Bluestreak say his name. He frowns. It 
felt so ... 
> familiar.
> 
> "I'm Prowl... Although I don't know what you mean by 'that' Prowl."
